fr.sii.ogham.email.builder

Class AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.email.builder.AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<AttachmentResourceTranslator>

    public class AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<AttachmentResourceTranslator>

    Builder for constructing a chained translator. Each translator is able to handle a kind of resource and to transform it into another resource.

    This builder simplifies the definition of the translators to use. Each defined translator will be applied on each resource.

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

      • build

        public AttachmentResourceTranslator build()
                                   throws BuildException
        Generate a chain translator that delegates translation of resource to all enabled translators.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<AttachmentResourceTranslator>
        Returns:
        the chain translator
        Throws:
        BuildException - when the translator couldn't be generated

      • useDefaults

        public AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder useDefaults()
        Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values.

        It will register a LookupResourceTranslator for searching attachments using a lookup.

        It will enable default lookups (see useDefaultLookups()):
        • "classpath" for searching attachment into the classpath
        • "file" for searching attachment on the file system
        • "" when no lookup is defined. It searches in the classpath too
        Returns:
        this builder instance for fluent use

      • useDefaultLookups

        public AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder useDefaultLookups()
        Tells the builder to use the default lookup mapping:
        • "classpath" for searching attachment into the classpath
        • "file" for searching attachment on the file system
        • "" when no lookup is defined. It searches in the classpath too
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • withTranslator

        public AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder withTranslator(AttachmentResourceTranslator translator)
        Register a new translator. The translator is added at the end.
        Parameters:
        translator - the translator to register
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • withResourceResolver

        public AttachmentResourceTranslatorBuilder withResourceResolver(ResourceResolver resource)
        Register a lookup mapping. The key is the lookup. The value is the resource resolver.
        Parameters:
        resource - the attachment resource resolver
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • getResolverBuilder

        public FirstSupportingResourceResolverBuilder getResolverBuilder()

        Get the builder used to handle resource resolution.

        Access this builder if you want to:
        • Customize how attached resources are resolved
        • Register a custom lookup mapping resolver for attached resources
        Returns:
        the builder used to handle resource resolution
